project.description: Updates the repo with backups of the Jenkins state.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
cd $JENKINS_HOME git add --ignore-errors . git status | grep "deleted" | awk '{print $3}' > tempStatusFile type nul > blank fc tempStatusFile blank > nul if errorlevel 1 git rm --ignore-unmatch < tempStatusFile
git commit -am "Automated Jenkins commit" git push -q origin master
